attributes.additional_details:
Our mission is simple, to stop the murders of innocent ducks.

We are sick of seeing the bodies of dead ducks left on the roads of Boroughbridge and feel the best way to prevent this is to erect a 'Duck Crossing' sign.

Our research shows that 100% of ducks that have been murdered in Boroughbridge have been on roads without a duck crossing sign. We conducted further research on roads out of town with duck crossing signs in place. Our results were overwhelming, showing 0 dead ducks on these roads.

We know that this evidence is incredible and proves just how obvious it is that a duck crossing sign should be put up in Boroughbridge.

All we want to do is save the ducks of Boroughbridge from getting murdered and feel the government are the ones that can help by putting up at least one duck crossing sign.

So please sign the petition to show you are more passionate about saving ducks than the murderers are killing them, we can't let them win.

Thank you
